description: Cognitive Car Dashboard sample workspace which allows multi-turn conversations to perform tasks in the car.

output.text: It doesn't look like there are any restaurants that serve @cuisine_bad around you. Try saying things like burgers or tacos.

values: I see a few restaurants nearby which you can select from, serving tacos, burgers, seafood and pasta. Which cuisine would you like?
I love tacos. I'm sure you'll love them too! Which restaurant do you want to drive to?
Super! I've found 5 locations for you. Which one would you like to drive to?
I prefer not to text while I drive.

output.text: Sorry I can't make a phone call. I must be all out of minutes!
Sorry I don't recognize that genre. Want to try something? Jazz? Rock?
